remarks: Version of ~ intss1 using a class abstraction and implicit substitution.  Closed form of ~ intmin3 .  (Contributed by BJ, 29-Nov-2019.)
statement:
bj-intabssel1.nf $e |- F/_ x A $.
bj-intabssel1.nf2 $e |- F/ x ps $.
bj-intabssel1.is $e |- ( x = A -> ( ps -> ph ) ) $.
bj-intabssel1 $p |- ( A e. V -> ( ps -> |^| { x | ph } C_ A ) ) $.
